original_text:
For that would be a heinous crime;
    that would be an iniquity to be punished by the judges;
korean_text: 그것은 참으로 음란한 일이니 재판에 회부할 죄악이요

sentences.original_text: For that would be a heinous crime
that would be an iniquity to be punished by the judges
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 재판관들에게 벌을 받을 불법일 것이다
